item.title: Green Line Guy Seems OK
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: On a typical weekday, Horn [executive director of the Monorail] works over the cellphone or his BlackBerry handheld computer while he rides the No. 5 bus downtown. A staff meeting begins at 7:30 a.m., and latecomers are fined $1 per minute. The lesson he takes from Sound Transit is that quickness means everything. Bet the head of Sound Transit doesn't take the bus with his $170,000 salary...
